mapper.sql: id, bp_id, user_id, target_id, quantity, price, type, status, updated, created
mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT price FROM consignment WHERE target_id = #{targetId} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS newset, ( SELECT price FROM consignment WHERE target_id = #{targetId} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS hight, ( SELECT price FROM consignment WHERE target_id = #{targetId} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS low
mapper.insert: insert into consignment (id, bp_id, user_id, target_id, quantity, price, type, status, updated, created) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into consignment
id,
bp_id,
user_id,
target_id,
quantity,
price,
type,
status,
updated,
created,

mapper.update:
update consignment
bp_id = #{bpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
target_id = #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update consignment set bp_id = #{bpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, target_id = #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
